channel.title: C4D help
channel.description:
Ok i started playing around with C4D and came up with a rather stupid looking lamp, my problme is how do i put like a light in it ?, ( the lamp is un finished )
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img252.imageshack.us/img252/3808/firstprojectmp0.jpg[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-08-01

item.title: C4D help
item.dc:creator: @maru maru
item.description:
@maru wrote:

It depends. How do you want the light to appear? With that metallic texture, the light wouldnâ€™t go through the material. There are plenty of tutorials all over the place for modeling lights.
